Some productions use blind casting techniques where identifying information like names and photos are removed from submissions to reduce unconscious bias.

Creating a welcoming and inclusive environment on set is crucial. This includes having a diverse crew, providing sensitivity training, and ensuring everyone feels respected and valued.
